member.name: CERT_TEMPLATE_EXT
member.summary: The CERT_TEMPLATE_EXT structure is a certificate template.

member.name: CERT_TEMPLATE_EXT.dwMajorVersion
member.summary: DWORD indicating the major version of the template.

member.name: CERT_TEMPLATE_EXT.fMinorVersion
member.summary: BOOL flag set to TRUE if there is a minor version number.

member.name: CERT_TEMPLATE_EXT.dwMinorVersion
member.summary: DWORD indicating the minor version of the template.
